translations: n.环境保护主义者，环境保护论者；环境艺术家

phrs.translation: 环保人士, 环境保护者, 环境保护论者
持疑的环保论者, 多疑的环境保护论者, 多疑的环保主义者, 持怀疑态度的环保
环保人士, 环境保护者

sentences.sentence: The woman has become an environmentalist on her own.
sentences.translation: 这位女士靠自己成为了一名环保主义者。

sentences.sentence: When you were trying to figure out what to buy for the environmentalist on your holiday list, fur probably didn't cross your mind.
sentences.translation: 如果你在想给环保人士购买什么节日礼物时，皮草很可能不会在考虑范围内。

sentences.sentence: The royal environmentalist has been promoting radical ideas for most of his adult life.
sentences.translation: 这位王室环保主义者在成年后的大部分时间里一直在宣扬激进的理念。
